content:
Document Details:
- Document Name: Analysis pdf
- Relevant Section: ASSISTANT, Page 1

Detailed Information:
- The document covers a detailed analysis of the financial structure of JSW Cement:
- The finance function is led at the board level by a combined commercial and finance role rather than a separate CFO role
- The Chief Financial Officer (CFO) of JSW Cement Limited is Narinder Singh Kahlon:
- His designation is Director Finance & Commercial and Chief Financial Officer:
- He has a status of a Whole-time director (service) , with a service term of three years starting from May 8, 2024. He is liable to retire by rotation and has been on the Board since May 8, 2018.
- The CFO role is integrated with finance plus commercial responsibilities, reflecting a broader strategic view over pricing, commercial decisions, and capital allocation.
- His presence on the Board signals that finance is central to strategic decision-making; including expansion projects and capital structure/IPO-related decisions:
- The report date is December 10, 2025.
